data.text: “Misi yi sitsoƒe, mi Benyaminviwo!
Magblẽ Zion vinyɔnu si dze tugbe nyuie
Alẽkplɔlawo kple woƒe alẽhawo atso ɖe eŋuti,
“Midzra ɖo, miawɔ aʋa kplii!
Eya ta mitso ne míadze aʋa le zã me
Ale Yehowa, Dziƒoʋakɔwo ƒe Aƒetɔ la gblɔe nye esi:
Abe ale si vudo dzia tsii ene la,
Oo, Yerusalem,
Ale Yehowa, Dziƒoʋakɔwo ƒe Aƒetɔ la,
Ame ka maƒo nu na, eye mana nuxɔxlɔ̃e?
Ke Yehowa ƒe dɔmedzoe helĩhelĩ la yɔm fũu
Woatsɔ woƒe aƒewo ana ame bubuwo hekpe ɖe woƒe agblewo
“Elabena wo katã wonye ŋuklẽlawo ɖe viɖe ŋuti,
Wobla abi na nye dukɔ abe ɖe menye
Ɖe woƒe ŋunyɔnu siwo wɔm wole la,
Ale Yehowa gblɔe nye esi:
Meɖo gbetakpɔlawo na mi hegblɔ na mi be,
Eya ta miesee o. Oo, mi dukɔwo, Oo ɖasefowo,
Oo, anyigba, see.
Nu ka dzudzɔʋeʋĩdonu si tso Seba nye nam
Eya ta ale Yehowa gblɔe nye esi:
Ale Yehowa gblɔe nye si,
Wogbɔna kple aŋutrɔ kple akplɔ.
“Míese nutsotso geɖe tso wo ŋu
Migado yi ɖe agble alo azɔ le mɔtatawo dzi o,
Oo, nye dukɔ, mita akpanya,
“Metsɔ wò ɖo galolõlae eye nye dukɔe
Wo katã nye aglãdzela vɔ̃ɖivɔ̃ɖiwo.
Wole ʋu yɔm kple ŋusẽ be
Woyɔa wo be klosalo si wogbe,
